snippet: CONNOLLY--Edythe Slattery Sheehan, born February 5, 1928; Died December 17, 2015 in Brooklyn, NY. Fifth generation Brooklynite, Edythe was the widow of William G. Sheehan and Edward J. Connolly, she was preceded in death by her parents Clare (nee Smith) and J. Warren Slattery and her sister, Clare Slattery Kelly. She is survived by her children, William Sheehan (Daria Doyle) Mount Vernon, NY, Kathleen Sheehan (Daniel Burke) Fairfield, CT, Jane Sheehan (Matthew Murphy) Princeton, NJ, Clare Sheehan, Brooklyn, NY, Kevin Sheehan, Brooklyn, NY and Brian Sheehan (Maria Fong) Syracuse, NY; her stepdaughter Jane D. Connolly (Edward Schwarz) Weston, CT, her sister, Marylou Slattery Millard, Fenwick, Old Saybrook, CT and 11 grandchildren and 12 nieces and nephews. A memorial service is being planned for spring 2016 in Brooklyn, NY. 1/3

A memorial service is being planned for spring 2016 in Brooklyn, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CONNOLLY, EDYTHE SLATTERY SHEEHAN
